alert.note: Alert for Delaware; Eastern Chester; Eastern Montgomery; Lower Bucks; Philadelphia; Upper Bucks; Western Chester; Western Montgomery (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 18 at 7:20PM EST by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...SNOW SHOWERS WILL AFFECT SOUTHEASTERN MORRIS...HUNTERDON... MERCER...NORTH CENTRAL BURLINGTON...SOMERSET...WEST CENTRAL MONMOUTH...MIDDLESEX...MONTGOMERY...BUCKS...NORTHEASTERN CHESTER... NORTHERN PHILADELPHIA AND NORTH CENTRAL DELAWARE COUNTIES... At 720 PM EST, snow showers were located along a line extending from near Clinton to near West Chester. Movement was east at 45 mph. Wind gusts up to 40 mph are possible with these snow showers. Locations impacted include... Philadelphia, Trenton, New Brunswick, Perth Amboy, West Chester, Somerville, Somerset, Edison, Old Bridge, Bensalem, East Brunswick, Bridgewater, South Brunswick, Sayreville, North Brunswick, Ewing, Norristown, Carteret, Phoenixville and Lansdale. This includes the following highways... New Jersey Turnpike between exits 7A and 12. Pennsylvania Turnpike between mile markers 309 and 359. Northeast Extension between mile markers 21 and 39. Interstate 95 in Pennsylvania between mile markers 37 and 40. Interstate 76 in Pennsylvania between mile markers 327 and 337. Interstate 78 in New Jersey between mile markers 22 and 43. Interstate 195 in New Jersey between mile markers 0 and 10. Interstate 295 in New Jersey between mile markers 56 and 76. Interstate 287 in New Jersey between mile markers 0 and 29. Interstate 476 in Pennsylvania between mile markers 11 and 19. Garden State Parkway between mile markers 123 and 133. Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Slow down and allow extra time when traveling.
